                                           PrunedPartitionList partList,
                                           ColumnStatsList colStatsCache,

                                    throws HiveException
        Collect table, partition and column level statistics

        tableScanOperator - - table scan operator
        Returns:
        statistics object
        Throws:

      • getNumRows

        public static long getNumRows(HiveConf conf,
                              List<ColumnInfo> schema,
                              Table table,
                              PrunedPartitionList partitionList,
                              AtomicInteger noColsMissingStats)
        Returns number of rows if it exists. Otherwise it estimates number of rows based on estimated data size for both partition and non-partitioned table RelOptHiveTable's getRowCount uses this.
        Parameters:
        conf -
        schema -
        table -
        Returns:

      • inferAndSetPrimaryKey

        public static void inferAndSetPrimaryKey(long numRows,
                                         List<ColStatistics> colStats)
        Based on the provided column statistics and number of rows, this method infers if the column can be primary key. It checks if the difference between the min and max value is equal to number of rows specified.
        Parameters:
        numRows - - number of rows
        colStats - - column statistics

      • inferForeignKey

        public static boolean inferForeignKey(ColStatistics csPK,
                                      ColStatistics csFK)
        Infer foreign key relationship from given column statistics.
        Parameters:
        csPK - - column statistics of primary key
        csFK - - column statistics of potential foreign key
        Returns:

      • getMaxIfOverflow

        public static long getMaxIfOverflow(long val)
        negative number of rows or data sizes are invalid. It could be because of long overflow in which case return Long.MAX_VALUE
        Parameters:
        val - - input value
        Returns:
        Long.MAX_VALUE if val is negative else val

      • areBasicStatsUptoDateForQueryAnswering

        public static boolean areBasicStatsUptoDateForQueryAnswering(Table table,
                                                             Map<String,String> params)
        Are the basic stats for the table up-to-date for query planning. Can run additional checks compared to the version in StatsSetupConst.

                                                              Map<String,String> params,

        Are the column stats for the table up-to-date for query planning. Can run additional checks compared to the version in StatsSetupConst.
